attributes.action: introduce fixed campaign budgets for parliamentary parties for use in general elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To eliviate the need for political parties to raise funds via private individuals and organisations, which could lead to a future conflict of interest, we should have a state funded fixed budget for general elections. This would also stem the flow of the UK process turning into a US style election where the person with the biggest budget wins.
